prompt: Log in to Digital Customer Portal - Landing page is Displayed

Check that page contains top ribbon with:-Siemens healthineers Logo
-My Digital Lab Assistant (vX.X.X)
-Contact icon
-Language icon
-Settings icon
-Notification bell icon
-Icon with name shortcut
-Name of logged in user
-Admin icon
For reference check attached screenshot - Landing page top ribbon content is according screenshot and consists of:- Contact icon
- Settings icon
- Notification bell icon
- Icon with name shortcut
- Name of logged in user
- Admin icon
completion:
tc.stepEvaluator.reset();
WaitFor.condition(() -> tc.button.exists(EButton.ADMIN));
tc.stepEvaluator
.add(() -> tc.menu.exists(EMenu.LANGUAGE), "Language icon is not present")
.add(() -> tc.menu.exists(EMenu.SETTINGS), "Settings icon is not present")
.add(() -> tc.button.exists(EButton.CONTACT), "Contact button is not present")
.add(() -> tc.button.exists(EButton.NOTIFICATIONS), "Notifications button is not present")
.add(() -> !tc.browser.getActiveUser(EActions.ICON).isEmpty(), "user icon is not present")
.add(() -> !tc.browser.getActiveUser(EActions.USERNAME).isEmpty(), "user name is not present")
.add(() ->  tc.button.exists(EButton.ADMIN), "admin icon is not present");

tc.addStepInfo("""
Landing page top ribbon content is according screenshot and consists of:
- Contact icon
- Settings icon
- Notification bell icon
- Icon with name shortcut
- Name of logged in user
- Admin icon""",
"ok", tc.stepEvaluator.eval(), new ComparerOptions().takeScreenShotPlatform());

prompt:
Check that page contains following tiles:- Report an issue with an order or delivery
- Show me my Requests
- Question about an order or eSuport assistance
- Question about my Account
- Request Allocation or Saturday Delivery (SET Request)

For reference check attached screenshot - Landing page tile content is according screenshot and consists of following tiles:- Report an issue with an order or delivery
- Show me my Requests
- Question about an order or eSuport assistance
- Question about my Account
- Request Allocation or Saturday Delivery (SET Request)
Click on tile Report an issue with an order or delivery - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened
Click on tile Show me my Requests - Page with dashboard with all requests created by the user is opened
Click on tile Question about an order or eSuport assistance - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened
Click on tile Question about my Account - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened
Click on tile Request Allocation or Saturday Delivery (SET Request) - User is redirected to external Sales Efficiency tool page
Log in to Digital Customer Portal - Landing page is displayed

Click on "Contact" icon on top ribbon - Popup with following text is displayed:Contact Support
For any questions regarding this portal feel free to reach out to our E-Support team: 800-242-3233
For reference check attached screenshot
Click on "Close" button - Landing page is displayed
Click on "Language" icon  on top ribbon - Options English and Deutsch are displayed.
Click on "Deutsch" - Landing page is displayed. Language is changed to german language.
Click on "Language" icon  on top ribbon and select "English" - Landing page is displayed. Language is changed to english language.
Click on "Settings" icon  on top ribbon - Options "Theme" and "Email Notification Settings" are displayed.

Click on "Email Notification Settings" - Email Notifications page is displayed.All notifications are turned on by default.
For reference check attached screenshot
Change notifications from ON to OFF and back to ON - Messsage "Sucessfuly updated settings" is displayed after any notification option is changed
Click on "My Digital Lab Assistant (vX.X.X)" on top ribbon - User is redirected to landing page
Log in to Digital Customer Portal - Landing page is displayed
Click on tile "Report an issue with an order or delivery" - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened - Part 1. Personal information

Enter data in to following fields:- Name - name of logged user, not possible to modify
- E-Mail - email of logged user, not possible to modify
- @Mobile
- @Country
- @State
- Preferred @language

For reference check attached screenshot - User is able to enter information in specified fields
Click "Next" button - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened - Part 2. Request information

Enter data in to following fields:- Request type - Possible to select one from the list("Order Issue", "Question about Account", "Invoice inquiry", "Question about Order")
- Subject
- Reason
- Classification
- Siemens Healthineers Team
- Sold To
- Ship to
- Puchase Order or Order Number - add multiple entries by clicking on "+ Add Order Number"
- Additional E-Mail - add multiple entries by clicking on "+ Add E-Mail"

For reference check attached screenshot - User is able to enter information in specified fields
In section Attachments click on icon "Browse files", select files that will be attached to this issue and click "Open" - Icon with name of each individual file is created in section Attachments
Drag and drop file from your computer in to section Attachments - Icon with name of file is created in section Attachments
Click "Next" button - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened - 3. Check your information
Verify that the content of fields on the screenFor reference check attached screenshot - Values of the fields are the same as were entered in step 3 and 5

Check the checkboxes:- "Informational Only" or "Refer Out Request adter Submission" - Checkboxes can be checked.When one of checkboxes "Informational Only" or "Refer Out Request adter Submission" is checked the other is greyed out and impossible to check

Click "Save + Submit" button - Popup with following text is diplayed:Save & Submit Request
Are you sure you want to submit this request? You will not be able to make any changes after submission

For reference check attached screenshot

Click "Yes, submit" button - Popup with following test is diplayed:Congratulations! Your issue has been reported.

For reference check attached screenshot
Click "Go back to the dashboard" button - Landing page is displayed

Verify that notification was not sent to email addresses menitoned in fields E-Mail and Additional E-Mail . For reference check attached screenshot . - Notification email was not received by email addresses menitoned in fields E-Mail and Additional E-Mail
completion:
tc.addStepInfo("Notification email was not received by email addresses menitoned in fields E-Mail and Additional E-Mail",
true, true, new ComparerOptions().takeScreenShotPlatform());

prompt: Click on tile "Show me my Requests" - Page with dashboard with all requests created by the user is opened on tab My Dashboard . For reference check attached screenshot .
Click on tab "Created Requests" - Page with list of all requests created by the user is opened on tab My Dashboard For reference check attached screenshot
Enter request ID or part of Subject in to search field - Only requests matching search conditions are displayed
Click on filtered request - Request detail page is opened on Comment tabFor reference check attached screenshot

Verify content of fields on the screenFor reference check attached screenshot
- Reason from step 5 is used as 1st comment
Enter text, add attachment and submit new comment by clicking ">" icon - New comment is added

- Values of the fields are the same as were entered in step 3 and 5

Select tab "Requestor Information" and verify content of fields on the screenFor reference check attached screenshot
- Values of the fields are the same as were entered in step 3 and 5

Select tab "Request Overview" and verify content of fields on the screenFor reference check attached screenshot
- Values of the fields are the same as were entered in step 3 and 5
Click on button "Back" - Page with dashboard with all requests created by the user is opened on tab My Dashboard
Click on tab "Created Requests" and click on your request created in previous steps - Request detail page is opened on Comment tabFor reference check attached screenshot

Select tab "Request Information" and click on the button "Delete" - Popup with following text is diplayed:Delete Request
Request will be removed from your list of saved requests.

For reference check attached screenshot
Click "Confirm" button - Notification about successful operation is displayed on the bottom of the screen. User is redirecrted to Landing page
Click on tile "Show me my Requests" and open tab "Created Requests" - Order selected in step 25 is no longer visible in the list.

Click on tile "Report an issue with an order or delivery" - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened - Part 1. Personal information
Enter data in to following fields: - User is able to enter information in specified fields
Click "Next" button - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened - Part 2. Request information

Enter data in to following fields: - Request type - preselected "Order Issue" not possible to modify - Subject - Reason - Siemens Healthineers Team - Sold To - Ship to - Puchase Order or Order Number - add multiple entries by clicking on "+ Add Order Number" - Additional E-Mail - add multiple entries by clicking on "+ Add E-Mail" For reference check attached screenshot - User is able to enter information in specified fields

Click on "Language" icon  on top ribbon and select "English" - Landing page is displayed. Language is changed to english language.
Click on "Settings" icon  on top ribbon - Options "Theme" and "Email Notification Settings" are displayed.

Click on "Email Notification Settings" - Email Notifications page is displayed.All notifications are turned on by default.
For reference check attached screenshot
Change notifications from ON to OFF and back to ON - Messsage "Sucessfuly updated settings" is displayed after any notification option is changed
Click on "My Digital Lab Assistant (vX.X.X)" on top ribbon - User is redirected to landing page
Log in to Digital Customer Portal - Landing page is displayed
Click on tile "Report an issue with an order or delivery" - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened - Part 1. Personal information

Enter data in to following fields:- Name - name of logged user, not possible to modify
- E-Mail - email of logged user, not possible to modify
- Mobile
- Country
- State
- Preferred language

For reference check attached screenshot - User is able to enter information in specified fields
Click "Next" button - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened - Part 2. Request information

Enter data in to following fields:- Request type - Possible to select one from the list("Order Issue", "Question about Account", "Invoice inquiry", "Question about Order")
- Subject
- Reason
- Classification
- Siemens Healthineers Team
- Sold To
- Ship to
- Puchase Order or Order Number - add multiple entries by clicking on "+ Add Order Number"
- Additional E-Mail - add multiple entries by clicking on "+ Add E-Mail"

For reference check attached screenshot - User is able to enter information in specified fields
In section Attachments click on icon "Browse files", select files that will be attached to this issue and click "Open" - Icon with name of each individual file is created in section Attachments
Drag and drop file from your computer in to section Attachments - Icon with name of file is created in section Attachments
Click "Next" button - Page with details for reporting an issue is opened - 3. Check your information
Verify that the content of fields on the screenFor reference check attached screenshot - Values of the fields are the same as were entered in step 3 and 5
Check the checkbox "Mark as urgent" - Checkboxes can be checked.

Click "Save + Submit" button - Popup with following text is diplayed:Save & Submit Request
Are you sure you want to submit this request? You will not be able to make any changes after submission

For reference check attached screenshot

Click "Yes, submit" button - Popup with following test is diplayed:Congratulations! Your issue has been reported.

For reference check attached screenshot
Click "Go back to the dashboard" button - Landing page is displayed

Verify that notification was not sent to email addresses menitoned in fields E-Mail and Additional E-Mail . For reference check attached screenshot . - Notification email was not received by email addresses menitoned in fields E-Mail and Additional E-Mail
completion:
tc.addStepInfo("Notification email was not received by email addresses menitoned in fields E-Mail and Additional E-Mail",
true, true, new ComparerOptions().takeScreenShotPlatform());

prompt: Click on tile "Show me my Requests" - Page with dashboard with all requests created by the user is opened on tab My Dashboard . For reference check attached screenshot .
Click on tab "Created Requests" - Page with list of all requests created by the user is opened on tab My Dashboard For reference check attached screenshot
Enter request ID or part of Subject in to search field - Only requests matching search conditions are displayed
Click on filtered request - Request detail page is opened on Comment tabFor reference check attached screenshot

Verify content of fields on the screenFor reference check attached screenshot
- Reason from step 5 is used as 1st comment
Enter text, add attachment and submit new comment by clicking ">" icon - New comment is added

Select tab "Request Information" and verify content of fields on the screenFor reference check attached screenshot
- Values of the fields are the same as were entered in step 3 and 5

Select tab "Requestor Information" and verify content of fields on the screenFor reference check attached screenshot
- Values of the fields are the same as were entered in step 3 and 5

Select tab "Request Overview" and verify content of fields on the screenFor reference check attached screenshot
- Values of the fields are the same as were entered in step 3 and 5
Click on button "Back" - Page with dashboard with all requests created by the user is opened on tab My Dashboard
Click on tab "Created Requests" and click on your request created in previous steps - Request detail page is opened on Comment tabFor reference check attached screenshot

Select tab "Request Information" and click on the button "Delete" - Popup with following text is diplayed:Delete Request
Request will be removed from your list of saved requests.

For reference check attached screenshot
Click "Confirm" button - Notification about successful operation is displayed on the bottom of the screen. User is redirecrted to Landing page
Click on tile "Show me my Requests" and open tab "Created Requests" - Order selected in step 25 is no longer visible in the list.
Log in to Digital Customer Portal - Landing page is displayed

completion:
tc.stepEvaluator.reset();
WaitFor.condition(() -> !tc.browser.getActiveUser(EActions.USERNAME).isEmpty());
tc.stepEvaluator
.add(() -> tc.menu.exists(EMenu.LANGUAGE), "Language icon is not present")
.add(() -> tc.menu.exists(EMenu.SETTINGS), "Settings icon is not present")
.add(() -> tc.button.exists(EButton.CONTACT), "Contact button is not present")
.add(() -> tc.button.exists(EButton.NOTIFICATIONS), "Notifications button is not present")
.add(() -> !tc.browser.getActiveUser(EActions.ICON).isEmpty(), "user icon is not present")
.add(() -> !tc.browser.getActiveUser(EActions.USERNAME).isEmpty(), "user name is not present")
.add(() ->  tc.button.exists(EButton.APP_NAME), "App icon is not present");

tc.addStepInfo("""
Check that page contains top ribbon with:
- Siemens healthineers Logo
- My Digital Lab Assistant (vX.X.X)
- Contact icon
- Settings icon
- Notification bell icon
- Icon with name shortcut
- Name of logged in user""",
"ok", tc.stepEvaluator.eval(), new ComparerOptions().takeScreenShotPlatform());
